description: An audit of lessons on racism and equality will look for gaps "in the content", a minster says.
title: Isle of Man teaching of race-related issues to be reviewed
title_page: Isle of Man teaching of race-related issues to be reviewed - BBC News
maintext: "The survey is a good idea because speaking to the students will allow the department to find out which voices are under-represented and which are over-represented, and to balance that."
